text:
So based on feedback from peers, @_buildspace @_nightsweekends mates, friends & chatgpt -- I modified my idea card, hoping it's clearer and encompasses the entirety of the idea i want to build

i would love to read your feedback on this & how it resonates with you. thank you. 🙇🏻‍♀️ https://t.co/YUp3UwgiZy
